effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 320,366 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 153,327.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 363 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 59,078 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 134,276.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
